books.title: Gone Girl
books.author: Gillian Flynn
books.description: A thriller about a man suspected of causing his wife's disappearance.

books.title: The Shining
books.author: Stephen King
books.description: A family heads to an isolated hotel where a sinister presence influences the father into violence.

books.title: It
books.author: Stephen King
books.description: A group of children in a small town must face an ancient shape-shifting evil that takes the form of a clown.

books.title: The Haunting of Hill House
books.author: Shirley Jackson
books.description: Four people arrive at a notoriously unfriendly mansion to spend a summer investigating paranormal activity.

books.title: Bird Box
books.author: Josh Malerman
books.description: In a post-apocalyptic world, a mother and her two children must navigate blindfolded to avoid supernatural entities.

books.title: The Cabin at the End of the World
books.author: Paul Tremblay
books.description: A family's vacation takes a terrifying turn when strangers appear, demanding an unspeakable sacrifice.

books.title: The Woman in the Window
books.author: A.J. Finn
books.description: An agoraphobic woman believes she witnessed a crime in her neighbor's house.

books.title: The Girl on the Train
books.author: Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller about a woman who becomes embroiled in a missing person's investigation.

books.title: Behind Closed Doors
books.author: B.A. Paris
books.description: A psychological thriller that reveals the dark secrets of a seemingly perfect marriage.

books.title: A Court of Thorns and Roses
books.author: Sarah J. Maas
books.description: A retelling of Beauty and the Beast, featuring a strong heroine and a captivating world.

books.title: City of Bones
books.author: Cassandra Clare
books.description: The first book in the Mortal Instruments series, where a girl discovers the world of Shadowhunters.

books.title: The Silent Patient
books.author: Alex Michaelides
books.description: A psychological thriller about a woman who stops speaking after being accused of murdering her husband.

books.title: The Lord of the Rings
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: An epic high fantasy novel that follows the quest to destroy the One Ring.

books.title: The Hobbit
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: A fantasy novel about the adventures of a hobbit named Bilbo Baggins.

books.title: The Night Circus
books.author: Erin Morgenstern
books.description: A magical competition between two young illusionists takes place within an enchanting circus.

books.title: Moby Dick
books.author: Herman Melville
books.description: The narrative of Captain Ahab's obsessive quest to avenge the whale that bit off his leg.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A romantic novel that charts the emotional development of the protagonist, Elizabeth Bennet.
